author: akarasulu
msg: tests in bad form - still in bad for but making them less prone to error: checking strings of error messages is a really crappy way to setup tests!

author: minfrin
msg: Expose the apr_dso_handle_t when calling apu_dso_load, so that the
crypto code can call apr_dso_error and find out why the dso load
failed. The existing LDAP and DBD code ignores this, as their APIs
do not yet allow for errors to be returned.

author: sidney
msg: improve accuracy of FRT_PENIS1 by restricting it to end on word boundary

author: akarasulu
msg: DIRSERVER-1148: Adding the name of the result code enumeration to error messages for better comprehension of result codes

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1369: switch from Hashtable to HashMap and from Vector to List, when possible
